title: hi can pls some one responed me
body: hey riot ive creat a ticket in the support from like 2 days and no one responed me pls some one responed me

replies.body:
We're pretty overloaded with tickets at the moment, but our teams are working their butts off. A specialist will get back to you as soon as it's possible, so sit tight.

Let me know if you have any questions.
